html:
ultra-thin ceramic surfaces by florim skin

FLORIM skin, a brand by Florim, redefines the standards of surface design with its ultra-thin ceramic collection. At just 3mm thick and reinforced with fiberglass mesh, these surfaces come in a large 120×300 cm format, ideal for uninterrupted applications such as interior coverings, furnishing elements, and facades. Combining advanced technology with a focus on sustainability, the brand sets a new benchmark for eco-friendly materials, providing architects and designers with versatile surfaces that balance aesthetics and function.


FLORIM skin offers ultra-thin ceramic surfaces of only 3mm | all images courtesy of Florim

committed to sustainability in every detail

Known for its sustainable and high-quality ceramic production, Florim focuses on minimizing its environmental impact by utilizing renewable energy, recycling 100% of production waste, and reducing resource consumption. Being part of the CarbonZero initiative, the FLORIM skin product line demonstrates the Italian company’s eco-conscious approach, offering carbon-neutral surfaces that offset all CO2 emissions produced during their lifecycle. Additionally, by using thinner surfaces, the sub-brand further reduces raw material consumption, energy use, and transportation volumes, making it an excellent choice for green building projects.


reinforced with fiberglass mesh, the surfaces come in a large 120×300 cm format

florim’s large but slim ceramic solutions

FLORIM skin’s ultra-thin ceramic surfaces offer a lightweight solution for both interior and exterior applications. Their adaptability extends to flat and curved surfaces, making them a perfect fit for installations across walls, floors, furniture, and facades. Despite their slim 3mm profile, the expansive 120×300 cm format provides a clean, seamless look, while the advanced material composition with a reinforced fiberglass mesh ensures durability thanks to its high resistance to wear, heat, and chemicals.


suitable for both interior and exterior applications

Additionally, the surfaces are UV-resistant, ensuring lasting color vibrancy over time. Apart from maintaining color and dimensional stability even in extreme conditions, the non-porous surface is also easy to clean and meets the highest hygiene standards, making them an ideal option for environments that require strict cleanliness. Available in a broad range of finishes – from the raw appeal of natural textures to a sleek, minimalistic look – FLORIM skin provides architects and designers with sustainable ceramic surfaces for projects that require high-performance and precision.
